title: Introduction to Virtual Reality (VR)
introduction: Virtual Reality (VR) is a computer-generated simulation that immerses users in a 3D environment, providing a realistic and interactive experience.
details: VR is used in various industries, including gaming, education, training, and entertainment. It involves using specialized VR headsets and controllers to interact with the virtual world. Learning about virtual reality involves understanding VR hardware, software development kits, and VR design principles.
